Key Match Events: Lucas Erceg suffered a broken right thumb after throwing to first base in the 8th inning.
Vinnie Pasquantino threw off his glove and walked around in obvious pain before exiting the game due to a broken right thumb.
Brady Singer pitched six strong innings, yielding two runs on five hits with six strikeouts.
Kyle Isbel gave the Royals a 3-2 lead in the 7th inning with a three-run double into the left-field corner off Bryan Abreu.
Post-Match Reflections: Pasquantino will miss six to eight weeks due to the injury.
Erceg's hand injury ended his streak of 12 1/3 scoreless innings over 11 appearances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Minute Maid Park.
The Royals' intentional walk of Ben Gamel in the 8th inning was a strategic move.
